body: I couldn't stop thinking about how overheated that kid must be. Like,  he's already sweating, it's warmer inside the house like a sauna, then they get on top of him and start fucking him? No wonder he goes unconscious at the end, the poor kid must have heat stroke.
Needs to be clean properly, shit like this is unacceptable.
The anime is the real parody this one should be treat as a Canon
My heart just hurt. Now, I mean really, I should see a doctor.
